summary: The contact owns a 2017 Hyundai Santa Fe Sport. The contact stated that the vehicle was losing oil. Additional oil was added however, the oil was depleted the next day. The contact stated there was no oil on the ground. There were no warning lights illuminated. The vehicle was taken to the local dealer and it was suggested that an oil consumption test be performed. The vehicle was not diagnosed or repaired. The manufacturer was not contacted. The failure mileage was 100,003. The VIN was not available.
